knimeNode.name: Fuzzy c-Pearson-Means
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs fuzzy c-means clustering using Pearson Coefficient.

fullDescription.option: Number of clusters to use for the algorithm.
This is the maximum number of iterations to be performed.
Indicates how much the clusters are allowed to overlap.
Whether to induce a noise cluster or not.
Delta is the fixed distance from every datapoint to the noise cluster.
Delta is updated in each iteration, based on the average interpoint distances. However, a lambda parameter has to be set, according to the shape of the clusters.
If this option is selected, the clustering is performed in the memory, which speeds up the process.
Whether to calculate quality measures for the clustering. This can be time and memory consuming with large datasets.

ports.inPort: Datatable with training data. Make sure that the data are normalized!
ports.outPort: Input table extended by cluster membership

views.view: Shows the WithinClusterVariation and the BetweenClusterVariation, which are indicators for 'good' clustering.
